thread.title: Jeremy McConnell still has not met his newborn son DESPITE sharing snap (which he took from Stephanie Davis' Facebook)
thread.title_full: Jeremy McConnell still has not met his newborn son DESPITE sharing snap (which he took from Stephanie Davis' Facebook)

author: Lucy Buckland
title: Jeremy McConnell still has not met his newborn son DESPITE sharing snap (which he took from Stephanie Davis' Facebook)
text:
Jeremy McConnell acknowledges that he is Caben-Albi's dad Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Deadbeat dad Jeremy McConnell has not seen his own baby son despite sharing an Instagram snap of the newborn, captioning it "my world." 
Irish hunk Jez shared the adorable picture of Caben-Albi, who was born on January 13th, with fans immediately thinking the love rat had taken it himself. 
But Mirror Online can exclusively reveal Jeremy, 27, posted the picture after he took off him from ex Stephanie Davis private social media account. 
Also, we can reveal Jeremy still has not met his son and has not offered to "in the near future" but it is believed the pair are trying to sort themselves out for the baby. 
A source close to the Jeremy said they were in discussions about the future but admitted his post is very misleading as he definitely hasn't met his newborn son. 
Yesterday, Twitter went into meltdown after Jez posted an adorable picture of his son, alongside the message: "Happiest man alive , my new focus", causing speculaytion over whether a DNA test had been returned. 
There has been no official statement from either camp on Caben'Albi's paternity, but Steph has always insisted he was the father. 
The tattooed hunk met the former Hollyoaks actress last year when they both took part in Celebrity Big Brother . 
They fell in love and continued dating on the outside world until things turned sour a few months later. Read More Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell met in CBB last year (Photo: Stephanie Davis / Twitter) Jeremy shared this picture of Caben-Albi 
Steph soon found out she was pregnant and at the time, Jeremy said it wasn't true.
